Allowed file extensions for upload. Sepa: Allowed file extensions for upload. Separate multiple extensions with commas. Leave empty for all file types.
Alternative to the top_p, and aims to en: Alternative to the top_p, and aims to ensure a balance of quality and variety. The parameter p represents the minimum probability for a token to be considered, relative to the probability of the most likely token. For example, with p=0.05 and the most likely token having a probability of 0.9, logits with a value less than 0.045 are filtered out.
e criar um novo link partilhado.

Control how message text is split for TT: Control how message text is split for TTS requests. 'Punctuation' splits into sentences, 'paragraphs' splits into paragraphs, and 'none' keeps the message as a single string.
Control the repetition of token sequence: Control the repetition of token sequences in the generated text. A higher value (e.g., 1.5) will penalize repetitions more strongly, while a lower value (e.g., 1.1) will be more lenient. At 1, it is disabled.
Controls the balance between coherence a: Controls the balance between coherence and diversity of the output. A lower value will result in more focused and coherent text.

CORS must be properly configured by the: CORS must be properly configured by the provider to allow requests from Open WebUI.
Create your first note by clicking on th: Create your first note by clicking on the plus button below.
Default mode works with a wider range of: Default mode works with a wider range of models by calling tools once before execution. Native mode leverages the model's built-in tool-calling capabilities, but requires the model to inherently support this feature.
Default to 389 or 636 if TLS is enabled: Default to 389 or 636 if TLS is enabled
Default to segmented retrieval for focus: Default to segmented retrieval for focused and relevant content extraction, this is recommended for most cases.

Direct Connections allow users to connec: Direct Connections allow users to connect to their own OpenAI compatible API endpoints.

Enable autocomplete generation for chat: Enable autocomplete generation for chat messages
Enable Memory Locking (mlock) to prevent: Enable Memory Locking (mlock) to prevent model data from being swapped out of RAM. This option locks the model's working set of pages into RAM, ensuring that they will not be swapped out to disk. This can help maintain performance by avoiding page faults and ensuring fast data access.
Enable Memory Mapping (mmap) to load mod: Enable Memory Mapping (mmap) to load model data. This option allows the system to use disk storage as an extension of RAM by treating disk files as if they were in RAM. This can improve model performance by allowing for faster data access. However, it may not work correctly with all systems and can consume a significant amount of disk space.
Enable Mirostat sampling for controlling: Enable Mirostat sampling for controlling perplexity.
Ensure your CSV file includes 4 columns: Confirme que o seu ficheiro CSV inclui 4 colunas nesta ordem: Nome, E-mail, Senha, Função.

Influences how quickly the algorithm res: Influences how quickly the algorithm responds to feedback from the generated text. A lower learning rate will result in slower adjustments, while a higher learning rate will make the algorithm more responsive.
Inject the entire content as context for: Inject the entire content as context for comprehensive processing, this is recommended for complex queries.

Only active when \"Paste Large Text as F: Only active when "Paste Large Text as File" setting is toggled on.

Oops! Looks like the URL is invalid. Ple: Epá! Parece que o URL é inválido. Verifique novamente e tente outra vez.
Oops! There are files still uploading. P: Oops! There are files still uploading. Please wait for the upload to complete.
Oops! There was an error in the previous: Oops! There was an error in the previous response.
Oops! You're using an unsupported method: Epá! Você está a usar um método não suportado (somente frontend). Por favor, sirva o WebUI a partir do backend.

Open WebUI uses SpeechT5 and CMU Arctic: Open WebUI uses SpeechT5 and CMU Arctic speaker embeddings.

URL/Chave da API OpenAI é necessária.
Options for running a local vision-langu: Options for running a local vision-language model in the picture description. The parameters refer to a model hosted on Hugging Face. This parameter is mutually exclusive with picture_description_api.

Please carefully review the following wa: Please carefully review the following warnings:
Please do not close the settings page wh: Please do not close the settings page while loading the model.
Prefix ID is used to avoid conflicts wit: Prefix ID is used to avoid conflicts with other connections by adding a prefix to the model IDs - leave empty to disable
Prompt (e.g. Tell me a fun fact about th: Prompt (ex.: Dê-me um facto divertido sobre o Império Romano)
Reduces the probability of generating no: Reduces the probability of generating nonsense. A higher value (e.g. 100) will give more diverse answers, while a lower value (e.g. 10) will be more conservative.
Refer to yourself as \"User\" (e.g., \"U: Refera-se a si próprio como "User" (por exemplo, "User está a aprender Espanhol")
Response notifications cannot be activat: Response notifications cannot be activated as the website permissions have been denied. Please visit your browser settings to grant the necessary access.
Saving chat logs directly to your browse: Guardar o registo das conversas diretamente no armazenamento do seu navegador já não é suportado. Reserve um momento para descarregar e eliminar os seus registos de conversas clicando no botão abaixo. Não se preocupe, você pode facilmente reimportar os seus registos de conversas para o backend através de
See what's new: Veja o que há de novo
Select only one model to call: Selecione apenas um modelo para a chamada
Selected model(s) do not support image i: O(s) modelo(s) selecionado(s) não suporta(m) entradas de imagem
Sends `stream_options: { include_usage::
Sends `stream_options: { include_usage: true }` in the request.
Supported providers will return token usage information in the response when set.
Set the number of layers, which will be: Set the number of layers, which will be off-loaded to GPU. Increasing this value can significantly improve performance for models that are optimized for GPU acceleration but may also consume more power and GPU resources.
Set the number of worker threads used fo: Set the number of worker threads used for computation. This option controls how many threads are used to process incoming requests concurrently. Increasing this value can improve performance under high concurrency workloads but may also consume more CPU resources.
Sets a flat bias against tokens that hav: Sets a flat bias against tokens that have appeared at least once. A higher value (e.g., 1.5) will penalize repetitions more strongly, while a lower value (e.g., 0.9) will be more lenient. At 0, it is disabled.
Sets a scaling bias against tokens to pe: Sets a scaling bias against tokens to penalize repetitions, based on how many times they have appeared. A higher value (e.g., 1.5) will penalize repetitions more strongly, while a lower value (e.g., 0.9) will be more lenient. At 0, it is disabled.
Sets how far back for the model to look: Sets how far back for the model to look back to prevent repetition.
Sets the random number seed to use for g: Sets the random number seed to use for generation. Setting this to a specific number will make the model generate the same text for the same prompt.
Sets the size of the context window used: Sets the size of the context window used to generate the next token.
Sets the stop sequences to use. When thi: Sets the stop sequences to use. When this pattern is encountered, the LLM will stop generating text and return. Multiple stop patterns may be set by specifying multiple separate stop parameters in a modelfile.
Shortcuts with an asterisk (*) are situa: Shortcuts with an asterisk (*) are situational and only active under specific conditions.
Show Admin Details in Account Pending Ov: Mostrar Detalhes do Administrador na sobreposição de Conta Pendente
Significantly improves accuracy by using: Significantly improves accuracy by using an LLM to enhance tables, forms, inline math, and layout detection. Will increase latency. Defaults to True.
Skip the cache and re-run the inference. Defaults to False.
Strip existing OCR text from the PDF and: Strip existing OCR text from the PDF and re-run OCR. Ignored if Force OCR is enabled. Defaults to False.
Tail free sampling is used to reduce the: Tail free sampling is used to reduce the impact of less probable tokens from the output. A higher value (e.g., 2.0) will reduce the impact more, while a value of 1.0 disables this setting.
The Application Account DN you bind with: The Application Account DN you bind with for search
The base to search for users: The base to search for users
The batch size determines how many text: The batch size determines how many text requests are processed together at once. A higher batch size can increase the performance and speed of the model, but it also requires more memory.
The developers behind this plugin are pa: The developers behind this plugin are passionate volunteers from the community. If you find this plugin helpful, please consider contributing to its development.
The evaluation leaderboard is based on t: The evaluation leaderboard is based on the Elo rating system and is updated in real-time.
The format to return a response in. Form: The format to return a response in. Format can be json or a JSON schema.
The height in pixels to compress images: The height in pixels to compress images to. Leave empty for no compression.
The language of the input audio. Supplyi: The language of the input audio. Supplying the input language in ISO-639-1 (e.g. en) format will improve accuracy and latency. Leave blank to automatically detect the language.
The LDAP attribute that maps to the mail: The LDAP attribute that maps to the mail that users use to sign in.
The LDAP attribute that maps to the user: The LDAP attribute that maps to the username that users use to sign in.
The leaderboard is currently in beta, an: The leaderboard is currently in beta, and we may adjust the rating calculations as we refine the algorithm.
The maximum file size in MB. If the file: The maximum file size in MB. If the file size exceeds this limit, the file will not be uploaded.
The maximum number of files that can be: The maximum number of files that can be used at once in chat. If the number of files exceeds this limit, the files will not be uploaded.
The output format for the text. Can be ': The output format for the text. Can be 'json', 'markdown', or 'html'. Defaults to 'markdown'.
The score should be a value between 0.0: A pontuação deve ser um valor entre 0.0 (0%) e 1.0 (100%).
The temperature of the model. Increasing: The temperature of the model. Increasing the temperature will make the model answer more creatively.
The width in pixels to compress images t: The width in pixels to compress images to. Leave empty for no compression.
This action cannot be undone. Do you wis: This action cannot be undone. Do you wish to continue?
This channel was created on {{createdAt}: This channel was created on {{createdAt}}. This is the very beginning of the {{channelName}} channel.
This chat won't appear in history and yo: This chat won't appear in history and your messages will not be saved.
This ensures that your valuable conversa: Isto garante que suas conversas valiosas sejam guardadas com segurança na sua base de dados de backend. Obrigado!
This feature is experimental and may be: This feature is experimental and may be modified or discontinued without notice.
This is an experimental feature, it may: Isto é um recurso experimental, pode não funcionar conforme o esperado e está sujeito a alterações a qualquer momento.
This model is not publicly available. Pl: This model is not publicly available. Please select another model.
This option controls how long the model: This option controls how long the model will stay loaded into memory following the request (default: 5m)
This option controls how many tokens are: This option controls how many tokens are preserved when refreshing the context. For example, if set to 2, the last 2 tokens of the conversation context will be retained. Preserving context can help maintain the continuity of a conversation, but it may reduce the ability to respond to new topics.
This option enables or disables the use: This option enables or disables the use of the reasoning feature in Ollama, which allows the model to think before generating a response. When enabled, the model can take a moment to process the conversation context and generate a more thoughtful response.
This option sets the maximum number of t: This option sets the maximum number of tokens the model can generate in its response. Increasing this limit allows the model to provide longer answers, but it may also increase the likelihood of unhelpful or irrelevant content being generated.
This option will delete all existing fil: This option will delete all existing files in the collection and replace them with newly uploaded files.
This will delete <strong>{{NAME}}</stron: This will delete {{NAME}} and all its contents.
This will delete all models including cu: This will delete all models including custom models
This will delete all models including custom models and cannot be undone.
This will reset the knowledge base and s: This will reset the knowledge base and sync all files. Do you wish to continue?
Tip: Update multiple variable slots cons: Dica: Atualize vários slots de variáveis consecutivamente pressionando a tecla Tab na entrada da conversa após cada substituição.
Title: Título
Título não pode ser uma string vazia.
To access the available model names for: Para aceder aos nomes de modelo disponíveis para descarregar,
To access the GGUF models available for: Para aceder aos modelos GGUF disponíveis para descarregar,
To access the WebUI, please reach out to: Para aceder ao WebUI, entre em contato com o administrador. Os administradores podem gerir o status dos utilizadores no Painel de Administração.
To attach knowledge base here, add them: To attach knowledge base here, add them to the "Knowledge" workspace first.
To learn more about available endpoints,: To learn more about available endpoints, visit our documentation.

To protect your privacy, only ratings, m: To protect your privacy, only ratings, model IDs, tags, and metadata are shared from your feedback—your chat logs remain private and are not included.
To select actions here, add them to the: To select actions here, add them to the "Functions" workspace first.
To select filters here, add them to the: To select filters here, add them to the "Functions" workspace first.
To select toolkits here, add them to the: To select toolkits here, add them to the "Tools" workspace first.
Toggle whether current connection is act: Toggle whether current connection is active.
Tools are a function calling system with: Tools are a function calling system with arbitrary code execution
Tools have a function calling system tha: Tools have a function calling system that allows arbitrary code execution.
Type Hugging Face Resolve (Download) URL: Escreva o URL do Hugging Face Resolve (Descarregar)
Uh-oh! There was an issue with the respo: Uh-oh! There was an issue with the response.
Update for the latest features and impro: Update for the latest features and improvements.
Upgrade to a licensed plan for enhanced: Upgrade to a licensed plan for enhanced capabilities, including custom theming and branding, and dedicated support.
Use '#' in the prompt input to load and: Use '#' in the prompt input to load and include your knowledge.
Use groups to group your users and assig: Use groups to group your users and assign permissions.
Use no proxy to fetch page contents.
Use proxy designated by http_proxy and h: Use proxy designated by http_proxy and https_proxy environment variables to fetch page contents.
Using the default arena model with all m: Using the default arena model with all models. Click the plus button to add custom models.
Warning: Enabling this will allow users: Warning: Enabling this will allow users to upload arbitrary code on the server.
Warning: If you update or change your em: Aviso: Se você atualizar ou alterar o seu modelo de vetorização, você tem de reimportar todos os documentos.
Warning: Jupyter execution enables arbit: Warning: Jupyter execution enables arbitrary code execution, posing severe security risks—proceed with extreme caution.
What are you trying to achieve?: What are you trying to achieve?
What's New in: O que há de novo em
When enabled, the model will respond to: When enabled, the model will respond to each chat message in real-time, generating a response as soon as the user sends a message. This mode is useful for live chat applications, but may impact performance on slower hardware.
Whether to paginate the output. Each pag: Whether to paginate the output. Each page will be separated by a horizontal rule and page number. Defaults to False.
Works together with top-k. A higher valu: Works together with top-k. A higher value (e.g., 0.95) will lead to more diverse text, while a lower value (e.g., 0.5) will generate more focused and conservative text.
Write a prompt suggestion (e.g. Who are: Escreva uma sugestão de prompt (por exemplo, Quem és tu?)
Write a summary in 50 words that summari: Escreva um resumo em 50 palavras que resuma [tópico ou palavra-chave].
You are currently using a trial license. Please contact support to upgrade your license.
You can only chat with a maximum of {{ma: You can only chat with a maximum of {{maxCount}} file(s) at a time.
You can personalize your interactions wi: Você pode personalizar as suas interações com LLMs adicionando memórias através do botão 'Gerir' abaixo, tornando-as mais úteis e personalizadas para você.
